Html:
Hi,

I'm trying to use the provided API documentation. Using the help viewer, I can see the TOC and index.. but no contents. That is, I can't navigate to any topic.

Is this because the API does not actually contain any content, or is there some other reason?

 

--hieronymus

Hi,

on the CHM file you have to right click and choose properties ->trust or something. By default Windows is not running the chm files you download :)
